rules_text:
Unless you’ve reached godhood, Ginilla, Storied Anchorite is an enchantment and isn’t a creature.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 green and blue Reflection creature token with ascend to godhood. [i](It has “If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.”)[/i]
